mapper.insert: insert into tbl_1in (cnum , video1_in , guide1_in , tukgang1_in , jindan1_in) values (#{cnum}, #{video1_in}, #{guide1_in}, #{tukgang1_in}, #{jindan1_in})
mapper.select: select cnum, video1_in, guide1_in, tukgang1_in, jindan1_in from tbl_1in where cnum = #{cnum}
mapper.update: update tbl_1in set video1_in = #{video1_in}, guide1_in = #{guide1_in}, tukgang1_in = #{tukgang1_in}, jindan1_in = #{jindan1_in} where cnum= "202020"
